QuestData.Title: The Temple of the Jade Serpent
QuestData.Description: You've done us a huge favor here, traveler.$B$BNow that we have enough jade to complete the statue, we should send word of our progress to Yu'Lon, the Jade Serpent.$B$BWhen you arrive, speak to Elder Sage Wind-Yi outside the entrance to the Temple of the Jade Serpent.$B$BIf you wish to speed your journey, speak to Kitemaster Shoku. I'm sure he can spare an extra kite for you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Elder Sage Wind-Yi outside the entrance to the Temple of the Jade Serpent. Speak to Kitemaster Shoku for a kite ride to the temple.
QuestData.RewardText: You bring news from the Serpent's Heart?$B$B<The Elder Sage patiently listens to your tale of what occurred at the Jade Mines and at the large jade statue.>$B$BThank you for coming all this way, stranger. However, I cannot allow you to speak to the Jade Serpent right now.$B$BThe ancient one is very busy, and as you can see, is not here at the moment.
